item.title: By: k

item.description: wow. Did you watch <a href="http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HhlauMYDWbI" rel="nofollow">My Heart, My Heart</a>?
item.content:encoded: wow. Did you watch My Heart, My Heart?

item.title: By: selloutmakemore
item.dc:creator: selloutmakemore
item.content:encoded:
when you “sell out” you make more of your product and then “sell more”
it’s so easy for an idiot nobody who hasn’t yet accomplished very much to hide on his little perch behind his garage and shout “sell out”
it all seems so shallow to me…i just saw the commercial and tried to find the name of the music…i’ve heard it before…but i want to thank EC for turning me onto this “new” music…i liked that he compared it to ROCKnROLL…check out my songs on youtube at “kuddlemeister” song name “myHeart,MyHeart”….you can leave any nasty reply there…i won’t be back to this blog…eva
